## Example

You see my Shiny App for creating pixel art models.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Installation
devtools::install_github("privefl/pixelart")

# Run Shiny App
pixelart::run_app()
```

## DataCamp course

We'll use [this free DataCamp course](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/building-web-applications-in-r-with-shiny) to learn the basics of Shiny.
